name: SPeace
description:
Move: WASD / Arrow keys

Drill: Right Click, E (Can be held for speed digging)

Shoot: Left Click

An apocalyptic, irony-free tale for all audiences: 60 seconds in the SPeace organization. Top-down randomly generated puzzle shooter.

Made in 48 hours in Java (Processing)! Very much a prototype still - will hopefully be further developed.
